title: Advance lifecycle and manage holds
purpose: Guide role-aware status transitions and hold overlay actions from the order lifecycle panel.
whenToUse: You need to move an order to its next lifecycle state.
A hold overlay must be applied or cleared with proper ownership.
prerequisites: Order draft has required data and at least one line.
Your role allows the requested transition or hold action.
stepByStepActions: Open Lifecycle Navigator on the order workspace.
Review current status, hold state, and blocked indicators.
Select the next permitted lifecycle action.
If blocked by hold, apply or clear hold overlay with reason and role context.
Confirm the status and owner fields updated after API success.
expectedResult: Lifecycle state updates are auditable and role restrictions are clearly communicated when actions are blocked.

commonErrorsAndRecovery.error: Role does not allow this action.
commonErrorsAndRecovery.cause: Requested transition is outside your RBAC permissions.
recovery: Use an allowed action for your current role.
Request supervisor or plant manager support for privileged transitions.

commonErrorsAndRecovery.cause: An active hold requires resolution before progression.
recovery: Review hold owner and reason in lifecycle details.
Clear hold with authorized role and reason code.

escalationPath: Escalate to Supervisor/Quality owner for hold disputes and privileged overrides.
